= |blank3_info = |website = http://www.oaxaca.gob.mx |footnotes = }} Oaxaca is a state in southeast Mexico. The capital is Oaxaca de Juárez. Oaxaca is next to Guerrero, Puebla, Veracruz, and Chiapas. About 3.5 million people live there. The Zapotec and the Mixtec people live in the state. There are more speakers of indigenous languages in this state than in any other state of Mexico. This Mexican state is known for its diverse culture and its native people. ==References== == Other websites == * Official site of the Popular Assembly of the People of Oaxaca * Official site of the State Government *Oaxaca Times *Mexican and Central American Archaeological Projects - Electronic articles published by the Division of Anthropology, American Museum of Natural History.
title: Oaxaca
